About me

I am Gun Bansal, final year BTech student at IET Lucknow with skills in competitive programming, DSA, and full-stack web development using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), along with graphic design. Proficient in HTML, CSS, Java, JavaScript, and React, with experience using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap. Currently building real-time MERN stack projects and enhancing problem-solving skills on GeeksforGeeks.

Seeking internship opportunities to apply and expand my expertise.
